title: Lesson 7: Spiritual Warfare
description: Viewing our jobs and vocations as mission fields for the Kingdom.

blocks.text: There is no divide between the 'sacred' tasks at church and the 'secular' tasks at your job. Whether you are a teacher, an engineer, a stay-at-home parent, or an artist, God calls you to worship Him through your daily work.
Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men, knowing that from the Lord you will receive the inheritance as your reward. You are serving the Lord Christ.
8.1 - How would viewing your current job or daily tasks as 'working for the Lord' change your attitude on Monday mornings?
Who are you currently BLESSing? Who are you praying for and actively moving toward? What is one specific step you are taking this week?
